channel.title: Sourcemods for Black Mesa?
channel.description: Just a simple question, is it possible to make a source mod that mounts the content of Black Mesa? So that you basically start with a copy of BM and you can mod it as you want (like a HL2 mod)?

item.title: Sourcemods for Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
Well, I mean it’s possible in that binaries can be decompiled, altered, and sewn back together again, but also so insanely difficult for a program of this size that you may as well work on putting a human on Mars.

item.title: Sourcemods for Black Mesa?
item.dc:creator: MegaKosan
item.description:
LordDz:

You can mod the game using Hammer editor and soon you can add custom content like models, materials, sound etc.

You however won’t have access to the source code as it’s limited to the devs.

Soon? You can do that already.

What I was asking was if it´s possible to make a mod for Black Mesa, like Black Mesa Source was for HL2.
Which is apparently not possible.
